website_summaries.verdict: Powerful and heavy-duty chainsaw that's relatively reliable and suitable for most homeowners.
pros: Easy to start, auto-oiling chainsaw cuts trees up 20 inches without breaking a sweat
Low-vibration operation keeps your muscles feeling fresh no matter how large the job
cons: Seems to lack some of the durability associated with the Craftsman brand

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: This was my first chainsaw I have purchased. I used it the process a few small tress we had come down in the back yard. Directions are very clear and easy to start. Saw has cut through everything I expected it to with ease. No too heavy to use for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: sharonlee davis

customer_reviews.title: It's a Craftsman - Enough Said
customer_reviews.text: Top of the line Craftsman chainsaw. Purchased for a Vietnam Veteran relative who absolutely adores it. His ancient, decades-old chainsaw - sorry, forgot the brand except it was from a small Midwestern company now out of business - finally gave up the ghost for good. He reckons this one will do him until he doesn't need it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great saw
customer_reviews.text: This is a great saw. Starts fast. Cuts fast. Light. What more do you need for home and small property than that...
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Good saw
customer_reviews.text: Could use more power. But, easy to use, 5 pulls and 3 pulls after pushing the choke, 1 pull on warm start. Chain power is great. But, stalls when it catches on wood. Need to go high rev before cutting. It doesn't have that CC for powerful cuts. But, great for home projects, definitely not for commercial use.
customer_reviews.author: Mui

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with chainsaw. I bought it, it started, and it did what it was built for. Had plenty of power to go thru what I put it too.
customer_reviews.author: TnMtnMn

customer_reviews.title: Good machine but cheap packaging
customer_reviews.text: Good machine, does what it should on smaller trees. Packaging was a huge fail. Delivered with blade sticking out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Brandiwhyne

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with this purchase, better than expected quality product
customer_reviews.author: Edie Cook

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little saw
customer_reviews.text: I owned an older model of this saw so i bought on for my son-in-law. Saw worked great with absolutely no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made of mostly plastic. CAUGHT ON FIRE!!!
customer_reviews.text: The saw is good, but it is made mostly of plastic and in china. Bought it to use every now and then and after the 3rd use the plastic above the exhaust caught on fire and melted due to the heat shield being poor quality. Returned it and tried one more time and had the same issue! If you really need a saw, spend the extra $50-$100 and get an Echo or a Stihl. That's what I did, and couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon N.

customer_reviews.title: Leaked Bar oil
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this a while ago for my father. I finally received it nd he decided he wanted to use it so we filled it with gas and oil and started bucking the small ground debris, We put it away intending to use it then next day but much to our surprise the next day when we came back all the bar oil previously in the saw was now in the protection case. Good working saw but with the big defect
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Powful
customer_reviews.text: The power is enough for my need.but the instruction how to put the gasoline is confused me, I had to take times to search online how to use the correct ratio to put gasoline mix with oil. Overall it is worth it than the electronic one.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Husband and his toys
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband. He wanted it and he got is as early christmas present.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: Broke in 5 minutes. Returned it for less than I paid, can't find parts anywhere. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Sonya salmons

customer_reviews.title: Great price.
customer_reviews.text: It’s craftsman what can I say. The price was great. I have been trying for weeks to pickup this size saw at Lowe’s. They were always out of stock.
customer_reviews.author: LouAnna Kaldy

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this 16 inch Craftsman Chainsaw, and am extremely pleased with the easy-start feature and power. It gets the job done. In addition, Craftsman provides the synthetic oil pre-measured for 1 gallon of gas, and a sturdy storage/carry case. My favorite feature is truly the easy start.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Owned this saw for a few years, but problem had less than 20 hours on it. When it ran, it cut very well. But each year it became harder to start. Just tried to bring it out for some spring clean up. Would not start. Decided to empty the gas, and out dropped the gas filter. When I tried to re-attach it to the plastic tube in the tank, the tube disintegrated. So now the dilemna of should I bring it somewhere to be fixed and maybe get a $150 bill to fix a $125 (new) chain saw? Probably not, so it becomes a throw away item.
customer_reviews.author: W. Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Good for occasional small jobs, but doesn’t restart easily when hot.
customer_reviews.text: The saw has decent power for the engine size and fired up quickly out of the box. However there are two issues with it. 1. The factory chain will dull quickly, so definitely pick up a spare aftermarket one. 2. When the saw gets hot, it becomes exceptionally difficult to start. I noticed the gas in mine was boiling and it was probably vapor locking. For the occasional limb or tree, it is a decent saw. But if you need to stop to refill, you may run into restarting issues like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Robenstein

customer_reviews.title: Started Right Up Out of the Box
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product so far. Started right up and cuts great. Part of the secret I think is fresh gas (preferably non-ethanol ano if you can find it and good 2 cycle oil). Price is best around and I think that Husqvarna makes this saw which certainly can't be a bad thing.
customer_reviews.author: Redcatcher

product_meta.title: Craftsman 41AY4216791 S165 42cc Full Crank 2-Cycle Gas Chainsaw-16-Inch Bar and Automatic Chain Oiler-Carrying Case Included, Liberty Red
product_meta.description: CRAFTSMAN 42cc 2-Cycle 16-Inch Gas Powered Lightweight Gas Powered Chainsaw with Heavy Duty Carrying Case, EasyStart, 3-Point Anti Vibration System and Tool-Free Access is engineered with advanced power to cut through large trees and manage storm damage. CRAFTSMAN engineered a robust 42cc full-crank engine, which provides greater power and longer equipment life with less vibration. CRAFTSMAN'S EasyStart technology, has an incredibly easy to pull starting system, getting you up and running in seconds. The Craftsman Gas Powered Chainsaw features a premium Craftsman 16" bar and low-kickback chain for all-around superior performance. Chain brake is inertia activated for safety while operating, stopping the chain automatically. The Lightweight Durable Poly Chassis is easy to handle and lighter in weight, without sacrificing power. This polymer chassis is engineered for reliable performance and prolonged use, with minimal user fatigue Heavy. The 3-point Anti Vibration system, coupled with the ergonomically-designed handle, reduces vibration and fatigue while increasing control and maneuverability, whether cutting through branches or trees. A robust side-mounted tensioning system saves time and ensures chain tension stays consistent, as chain adjustments are quickly made while working. The adjustable auto oiler system maintains the proper amount of lubricant on the chain, but also allows the user to manually increase or decrease oil flow, helping to keep the chain sharp, in addition to ensuring the saw cuts smoothly and safely. Tool less access to the spark plug and air filter provides quick and easy access to cleaning and replacement. Heavy-Duty Case, 2-Cycle Engine Oil and a scrunch are included. Backed by a 2-year limited . CRAFTSMAN gas solutions uphold our legacy of reliability with a gas-powered lineup that fuels your yardwork, from sun-up to equipment down!
feature_bullets: HIGH OUTPUT CRAFTSMAN ENGINE with 16-INCH BAR & CHAIN: 42cc full crank Craftsman 2 cycle engine provides greater power and less vibration. Premium 16-Inch bar and low-kickback chain cuts through even the toughest wood quickly and easily.

LIGHTWEIGHT DURABLE POLY CHASSIS: Easy to Handle, lighter in weight, without sacrificing power. This polymer chassis is engineered for reliable performance and prolonged use, with minimal user fatigue.
EASYSTART TECHNOLOGY: Designed for quicker, smoother and easier pull starts. Get right to work on lawn care, yard work, wood slicing, and other outdoor projects.

ADJUSTABLE AUTO CHAIN OILER with EASY VIEW: Maintains the proper amount of lubricant on the chain and allows the user to manually increase or decrease oil flow, keeping the proper amount of lubricant on the chain.

ERGONOMIC BALANCED DESIGN: 3-point anti-vibration system and a comfortable handle makes this chainsaw more balanced, maneuverable and comfortable to operate. Maintain command and comfortability for optimal performance.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars59 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
